page.title: 16British Rail _ Ardleigh
page.content: { BRITISH RAIL'S}main line from Colchester to Harwich runs through Ardleigh but we have no station now. { PASSENGER SERVICE}There are inter-city local trains, and the London-Harwich Hook of Holland boat train. { GOODS}Here are some of the goods carried on the line - Fords motor car parts, I.C.I. Farming products and Chemicals , M.O.D. Army Traffic and Explosives , B.S.A British steel , Bulmars Cider, Campbells soaps and other perishables,Gentrasco fruit and vegetables,Merzaio malta lines, Miscellaneous contact work. {In May 1985 the line was electrified and we had a B R film to warn us of the dangers.In the film a boy's football boots were thrown onto the power cable.He tried to get them down. He was electrocuted and badly burned.
